quoteText:
The third parties that display advertisements on our site may use tracking technologies, such as cookies, web beacons and similar technologies, to collect information about users who view or interact with their advertisements.
Unless expressly stated otherwise, our website does not provide personal information to these third parties.
This information allows them to deliver targeted advertisements and gauge their effectiveness.
title: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access

tosdr.case: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access
